short_summary: Redesign the counter Website of the Plains of  Abraham
full_summary:
================================
**Government Tender Announcement: Redesign of the Plains of Abraham Website**
==============================================================

**Title (English & French):** 
- **Redesign of the Plains of Abraham website**
- **Refonte du site Web des plaines d’Abraham**

**Reference Number (Number de référence):** cb-324-50327523

**Solicitation Number (Numéro de sollicitation):** CCBN-24-00084

**Publication Date (Date de publication):** November 10, 2023

**Tender Closing Date (Date de clôture de l'appel d'offres):** December 13, 2023 at 10:00:00 a.m. (EST)

**Expected Contract Start Date (Date de début du contrat prévue):** January 3, 2024

**Expected Contract End Date (Date de fin du contrat prévue):** March 31, 2025


**Tender Summary (Résumé de l'appel d'offres):**

The National Battlefields Commission (NBC) invites tenders from qualified contractors to redesign the Plains of Abraham website. The work will commence upon the signing of the contract in January 2024. The website is expected to be launched in fall 2024, with final completion by April 2025.

**Terms and Conditions (Conditions et modalités):**

- The Government of Canada reserves the right to negotiate the terms and conditions of the contract with the successful supplier.
- Proposals must be received by email to be considered valid.
- Late proposals will not be accepted.
- Proposals sent by fax will not be accepted.

**Contact Information (Information de contact):**

- Name: Philippe Lafrenière, Contracting Authority
- Email: philippe.lafrenière@ccbn-nbc.gc.ca
- Phone: (418) 948-2260

**Access to Tender Documents (Accès aux documents de l'appel d'offres):**

The tender documents can be downloaded from the website canadabuys.canada.ca. Please note that the Government of Canada assumes no responsibility for third-party announcements and attachments not posted directly on this website. 

This revised entry highlights the essential information of the government tender announcement while maintaining a concise and professional tone. The format has been changed to include headings and clear sections for improved readability. The content has been rephrased to eliminate redundant information and maintain clarity.
